Как бы описать этот "шедевр"?Ладно,начну.Сюжет-средний,из-за отсутствия голоса у ГГ я не чувствовал погружённость в этот мир.Графика-для 1999 годов хорошая,ничего не скажешь.Геймплей,уууу,вот тут подробно опишу.Почему на высокой сложности враги бессмертны,разве они не должны менять тактики поведения,больше использовать укрытия,использовать больше оружия?Также,во второй половине игры Габен, видимо захотел вы*бать психически игрока,поэтому карты становятся всё больше и больше,игрок не понимает куда ему идти,и что ему делать.Боссы,ааааааааааааааххххх,не играйте на высокой сложности,потому что боссы вас вы*бут.Музыка-она великолепна,хоть звучит редко.Коммьюнити-спидраннеры,не больше.Как итог-я не понимаю откуда у игры народная любовь,у нас правда столько говноедов,которые следуют за чьим-то мнением?Может быть,как-нибудь вернусь к ней,но уж точно не на выском уровне сложности....

Half Life yani ne denebilir ki. En çok Multiplayerda arkadaşlarımla takılırken zevk aldım tabii hikaye modu es geçilemez ama şu yılda pek tatmin etmeyecektir. İndirimi bekleyin 3 TL ye düşüyor alıp arkadaşlarla veya Türk serverlarında Delici ile milleti gebertebilirsiniz. Arada stres atmak için baya iyi oluyor alınır.

half-life is a fantastic game. i shall tell you quite a bit about it. in this game, you play as a test subject known as gordon freeman next-in-line to be tested at the black mesa scientific research facility. But, after a test gone wrong, many aliens from another dimension had invaded the facility to wreak havoc and attack everyone out of anger. You, through Gordon Freeman's eyes, must defend this facility, and slaughter all the aliens who have wrecked the place. the game goes on for quite a while, having puzzles in it that may bamboozle you for the next 30 minutes desperately trying to find an answer. The graphics and gameplay of the game are a little like Duke Nukem' but really serious. there have been parts of the game that are not all enticing, but the gameplay makes up for that. This game has got to be one of the greatest games i have ever played, leaving you unanswered at the end...

Even if I haven't beaten this game yet, I can wholeheartedly say that I enjoy it.  Having not played it back in '98, however, I feel like I have some unique perspective on Half-Life.  The storyline is very well thought out in my opinion (Keep in mind I am currently on Chapter 17, so impressions are subject to change).  The gameplay, however, does get a bit tedious in some areas.  Especially on Interloper, where there are often many enemies around corners that must be killed at once.  If you end up at a bad spot at one point, you will probably have to load an earlier save.  This is mostly a problem with Interloper specifically, however.  Any trouble you may have with Half-Life will come from the fact that it is difficult.  Genuinely difficult.  I've been playing on the Easy difficulty, and the enemies still give me some trouble.  But I like that.  This game doesn't hold your hand in any way, which is a breath of fresh air from a lot of games that spoon-feed things like gameplay mechanics and story through cutscenes and interactive tutorials, which, while nice, can often become annoying.  Half-life lets you figure things out for yourself, which in my opinion, is great. 

One thing I discovered, however, is that Half-Life actually has a server browser with several deathmatch servers.  All of these are completely unpopulated except for two.  I joined one and managed to rack up 200 kills, but in the end, found it very tiresome to get beamed by people with a Tau cannon and Gluon Gun.  The multiplayer is overall very unbalanced, and not the most fun.  For that reason, I cannot recommend it to anyone.  

So in short, while I would say that the singleplayer Half-Life experience holds up, the multiplayer experience does not.

EDIT 12/31/20: I just beat the entire game!  It ends on a cliffhanger, which I found to be a bit frustrating, but overall, I was still hooked all the way.  I still recommend this game, even after all these years.

$2 on sale is well worth the money you'll get out of it. Not only is the vanilla experience worth the time you'll sink in it, the amount of mods that add extra content to it along with the ability to play multiplayer (using Sven) is one of the best gaming experiences you'll have with other people. It's a beloved game for it's unique entry to the FPS genre along with it's current fan support is a fantastic entry into PC gaming.

It might have aged a bit (especially the last few chapters) but it's a classic, and a fantastic experience despite it's flaws.

What else can you say about Half-Life that hasn't already been said? 

It's master class in terms of progression and moment to moment storytelling. The music and sound design is top notch and much of it has held up surprisingly well despite the low bitrate of many of the voices and effects. It remains darkly comic in its depiction of pretentious brainiacs getting turned into mindless maniacs. It's atmospheric and even a little spooky at times. There's very few moments in which you don't feel absolutely immersed in the role of Gordon Freeman: PhD in  Clangin' and Bangin' all the way to the surface and beyond. 

It is subjectively the coolest thing from the late 90's and I still love it very, very much.

Half-Life é um jogo MUITO bom, é um jogo muito a frente do seu tempo e mesmo obviamente não possuindo gráficos atuais, a história é muito boa e cativante, tem batalhas épicas e vários diferentres tipos de inimigos, com certeza recomendo para aqueles que não jogaram e está com um bom preço.

So yeah coming from someone with zero half life knowledge before playing this and wanting to get an authentic experience, this game is great. I had a lot of fun playing, and I'm not even done with the storyline yet. When I first started up the game I was a little aprehensive to keep playing just because I got bored, so I picked it up again a few weeks later and wow, I was missing out. This game allows you to do things you didn't think possible blah blah blah fun game play blah blah blah. 

P.S If you think you are just gonna be able to run and gun your way through this game your wrong.

10/10
